mapper.select: select op.optionId, op.optionName from room_option rop inner join options op on rop.optionId = op.optionId where roomId = #{roomId}
mapper.insert: insert into room(roomType, addr, detailAddr, dealType, yearRent, deposit, monthRent, dealRent, areaP, areaM, floor, moveDay, mCost, parking, elevator, lof, title, content, createDate, hostId, lat, lng) values(#{roomType}, #{addr}, #{detailAddr}, #{dealType}, #{yearRent}, #{deposit}, #{monthRent}, #{dealRent}, #{areaP}, #{areaM}, #{floor}, #{moveDay}, #{mCost}, #{parking}, #{elevator}, #{lof}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{hostId}, #{lat}, #{lng})
insert into room_pic(roomId, picId, picName, createDate) values(#{selectKey}, #{num}, #{OnepicName}, now())
insert into post_deal (roomId, hostId, addr, createDate) values(#{selectKey}, #{hostId}, #{addr}, now())
mapper.select: select pd.postId, pd.title, pd.roomId, pd.addr, pd.createDate, pd.confirmYN, u.name from post_deal pd inner join user u on pd.hostId = u.userId order by pd.postId desc limit #{pageLimit}, 10
mapper.update: update room set agentId = #{agentId} where roomId = #{roomId}
update post_deal set agentId = #{agentId}, confirmYN = 'Y' where roomId = #{roomId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from room where roomId > 0
